# User Story: [Short Title]

<!-- LLM: User stories should be small (< 8 points), have specific acceptance criteria, and be completable in 1 sprint. Help ensure AC is testable. -->

**As a** [user type/persona]
**I want** [capability/feature]
**So that** [benefit/value]

---

## Acceptance Criteria

**Critical:** Acceptance criteria must be specific, testable, and verifiable.

- [ ] [Specific, testable criterion 1]
- [ ] [Specific, testable criterion 2]
- [ ] [Specific, testable criterion 3]

**Example Good Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] User can reset password via email link
- [ ] Reset link expires after 1 hour
- [ ] User receives error message if link is expired
- [ ] Password must meet complexity requirements (8+ chars, 1 number, 1 special char)

**Example Bad Acceptance Criteria (too vague):**
- [ ] Password reset works
- [ ] It's secure
- [ ] Users like it

## Test Scenarios

### Happy Path

2. [System response]
3. [User action step 2]
4. **Expected Result:** [What should happen]

### Edge Cases
- **Edge case 1:** [Scenario] → Expected: [Behavior]

### Error Scenarios
- **Error 1:** [What goes wrong] → Expected: [Error message and recovery]

---

## Definition of Done

All items must be checked before story is considered "Done":

- [ ] Code complete and follows `/engineering-standards.md`
- [ ] Unit tests written and passing
- [ ] Integration tests passing (if applicable)
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] All acceptance criteria verified (manually or automated)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if behavior changed)
- [ ] Deployed to staging environment
- [ ] QA sign-off (if QA involvement required)
- [ ] Product Manager sign-off
- [ ] No critical or high-severity bugs
